description: Step-by-step deployment of PC2 subsystem with 22 agents across 7 service groups, following MainPC Docker patterns

todos.text:
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ GROUP 1: pc2_infra_core â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Agents: ObservabilityHub, ResourceManager
B. Requirements:

# Docker Infrastructure Setup
1. Create docker/pc2_infra_core/ directory structure
2. Create Dockerfile for infra core services
3. Create docker-compose.yml with services:
   - redis_pc2_infra: Redis container (port 6380)
   - nats_pc2_infra: NATS container (port 4224)
   - observability_hub: ObservabilityHub agent (port 9100, health 9110)
   - resource_manager: ResourceManager agent (port 7113, health 8113)
4. Create requirements.txt with dependencies
5. Configure environment variables:
   - REDIS_URL=redis://redis_pc2_infra:6379/0
   - NATS_SERVERS=nats://nats_pc2_infra:4222
   - MAINPC_OBS_HUB=${MAINPC_OBS_HUB}
   - PYTHONPATH=/app
6. Setup Docker network: pc2_infra_core_network
7. Apply NATS hot-patch: localhost:4222 â†’ nats_pc2_infra:4222

# Validation Scripts
curl http://localhost:9100/metrics | wc -l  # ObservabilityHub
curl http://localhost:7113/resources | jq '.status'  # ResourceManager

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ito ang foundation ng PC2 subsystem. Ang ObservabilityHub ay critical para sa cross-machine sync sa MainPC. Tiyaking 100% operational ang Redis at NATS bago magpatuloy sa ibang groups, dahil lahat ng susunod na services ay umaasa dito.

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ GROUP 2: pc2_memory_stack â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Agents: MemoryOrchestratorService, CacheManager, UnifiedMemoryReasoningAgent, ContextManager, ExperienceTracker
B. Requirements:

# Docker Infrastructure Setup
1. Create docker/pc2_memory_stack/ directory structure
2. Create Dockerfile for memory services
3. Create docker-compose.yml with services:
   - redis_pc2_memory: Redis container (port 6381)
   - nats_pc2_memory: NATS container (port 4225)
   - memory_orchestrator: MemoryOrchestratorService (port 7140, health 8140)
   - cache_manager: CacheManager (port 7102, health 8102)
   - unified_memory_reasoning: UnifiedMemoryReasoningAgent (port 7105, health 8105)
   - context_manager: ContextManager (port 7111, health 8111)
   - experience_tracker: ExperienceTracker (port 7112, health 8112)
4. Configure dependencies: All depend on MemoryOrchestratorService
5. Setup environment variables and NATS connectivity
6. Apply NATS hot-patch to all 5 agents

# Validation Scripts
curl -d '{"key":"test","value":"data"}' http://localhost:7140/memory/set  # Memory latency
curl http://localhost:7102/cache/stats | jq '.hit_rate'  # Cache performance
curl -d '{"query":"test"}' http://localhost:7105/reason  # Reasoning capability

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ang memory stack ay core functionality ng PC2. Tiyaking ang MemoryOrchestratorService ay stable muna bago i-deploy ang iba dahil lahat ng memory agents ay depend dito. I-verify ang cache latency (<5ms) at reasoning accuracy.

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ GROUP 3: pc2_async_pipeline â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Agents: AsyncProcessor, TaskScheduler, AdvancedRouter, TieredResponder
B. Requirements:

# Docker Infrastructure Setup
1. Create docker/pc2_async_pipeline/ directory structure
2. Create Dockerfile for async processing services
3. Create docker-compose.yml with services:
   - redis_pc2_async: Redis container (port 6382)
   - nats_pc2_async: NATS container (port 4226)
   - async_processor: AsyncProcessor (port 7101, health 8101)
   - task_scheduler: TaskScheduler (port 7115, health 8115)
   - advanced_router: AdvancedRouter (port 7129, health 8129)
   - tiered_responder: TieredResponder (port 7100, health 8100)
4. Configure dependencies: TieredResponder â†’ ResourceManager, TaskScheduler â†’ AsyncProcessor
5. Setup queue management and load balancing
6. Apply NATS hot-patch to all 4 agents

# Validation Scripts
curl -d '{"task":"test_job","priority":"high"}' http://localhost:7101/tasks/submit  # Async processing
curl http://localhost:7115/scheduler/status | jq '.active_jobs'  # Scheduler status
seq 1 10 | xargs -n1 -P10 -I{} curl -s http://localhost:7129/route/test  # Load balancing

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ang async pipeline ay naghahandle ng task processing at routing. Critical na ma-test ang load balancing at queue management bago mag-integrate sa ibang services. Tiyaking ang scheduler ay hindi nag-overflow ng tasks.

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ GROUP 4: pc2_tutoring_cpu â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Agents: TutorAgent, TutoringAgent
B. Requirements:

# Docker Infrastructure Setup
1. Create docker/pc2_tutoring_cpu/ directory structure
2. Create Dockerfile for tutoring services
3. Create docker-compose.yml with services:
   - redis_pc2_tutoring: Redis container (port 6383)
   - nats_pc2_tutoring: NATS container (port 4227)
   - tutor_agent: TutorAgent (port 7108, health 8108)
   - tutoring_agent: TutoringAgent (port 7131, health 8131)
4. Configure dependencies: Both depend on MemoryOrchestratorService
5. Setup educational content and session management
6. Apply NATS hot-patch to both agents

# Validation Scripts
curl -d '{"question":"What is AI?"}' http://localhost:7108/ask | jq '.explanation'  # Tutor response
curl -d '{"student_id":"test","topic":"programming"}' http://localhost:7131/session/start  # Session management
curl http://localhost:7131/session/test/status | jq '.active'  # Session status

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ang tutoring services ay specialized CPU-bound workloads. Tiyaking may sufficient CPU resources at hindi nag-conflict sa ibang services. I-test ang response quality at session persistence bago i-expose sa users.

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ GROUP 5: pc2_vision_dream_gpu â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Agents: VisionProcessingAgent, DreamWorldAgent, DreamingModeAgent
B. Requirements:

# Docker Infrastructure Setup
1. Create docker/pc2_vision_dream_gpu/ directory structure
2. Create Dockerfile.gpu for GPU-enabled services
3. Create docker-compose.yml with services:
   - redis_pc2_vision: Redis container (port 6384)
   - nats_pc2_vision: NATS container (port 4228)
   - vision_processing: VisionProcessingAgent (port 7150, health 8150)
   - dream_world: DreamWorldAgent (port 7104, health 8104)
   - dreaming_mode: DreamingModeAgent (port 7127, health 8127)
4. Configure GPU allocation and CUDA support
5. Configure dependencies: DreamingModeAgent â†’ DreamWorldAgent, VisionProcessingAgent â†’ CacheManager
6. Apply NATS hot-patch to all 3 agents
7. Setup GPU monitoring and resource limits

# Validation Scripts
curl -F 'image=@test/sample.jpg' http://localhost:7150/process | jq '.objects'  # Vision processing
curl -d '{"scenario":"forest"}' http://localhost:7104/dream/generate | jq '.generated'  # Dream generation
curl http://localhost:7127/gpu/status | jq '.utilization'  # GPU utilization (<95%)

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ang GPU services ay resource-intensive. Tiyaking may available GPU memory at hindi nag-compete sa ibang GPU workloads. I-monitor ang GPU utilization (<95%) at memory usage para maiwasan ang out-of-memory errors.

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ GROUP 6: pc2_utility_suite â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Agents: UnifiedUtilsAgent, FileSystemAssistantAgent, RemoteConnectorAgent, AuthenticationAgent, AgentTrustScorer, ProactiveContextMonitor
B. Requirements:

# Docker Infrastructure Setup
1. Create docker/pc2_utility_suite/ directory structure
2. Create Dockerfile for utility services
3. Create docker-compose.yml with services:
   - redis_pc2_utility: Redis container (port 6385)
   - nats_pc2_utility: NATS container (port 4229)
   - unified_utils: UnifiedUtilsAgent (port 7118, health 8118)
   - filesystem_assistant: FileSystemAssistantAgent (port 7123, health 8123)
   - remote_connector: RemoteConnectorAgent (port 7124, health 8124)
   - authentication: AuthenticationAgent (port 7116, health 8116)
   - agent_trust_scorer: AgentTrustScorer (port 7122, health 8122)
   - proactive_context_monitor: ProactiveContextMonitor (port 7119, health 8119)
4. Configure dependencies:
   - AuthenticationAgent â†’ UnifiedUtilsAgent
   - FileSystemAssistantAgent â†’ UnifiedUtilsAgent
   - RemoteConnectorAgent â†’ AdvancedRouter
   - ProactiveContextMonitor â†’ ContextManager
   - AgentTrustScorer â†’ ObservabilityHub
   - UnifiedUtilsAgent â†’ ObservabilityHub
5. Apply NATS hot-patch to all 6 agents

# Validation Scripts
curl -d '{"user":"test","password":"secret"}' http://localhost:7116/auth | jq '.authenticated'  # Authentication
curl -d '{"path":"/tmp","operation":"list"}' http://localhost:7123/fs | jq '.files'  # Filesystem
curl -d '{"agent":"test","actions":["success"]}' http://localhost:7122/trust/score | jq '.score'  # Trust scoring

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ang utility suite ay support services na ginagamit ng ibang agents. Critical na ma-test ang authentication at filesystem operations dahil security-related. Tiyaking secure ang mga credentials at may proper access controls.

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ GROUP 7: pc2_web_interface â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Agents: UnifiedWebAgent
B. Requirements:

# Docker Infrastructure Setup
1. Create docker/pc2_web_interface/ directory structure
2. Create Dockerfile for web interface
3. Create docker-compose.yml with services:
   - redis_pc2_web: Redis container (port 6386)
   - nats_pc2_web: NATS container (port 4230)
   - unified_web_agent: UnifiedWebAgent (port 7126, health 8126)
4. Configure dependencies: UnifiedWebAgent â†’ FileSystemAssistantAgent, MemoryOrchestratorService
5. Setup web server, static files, and API endpoints
6. Configure CORS and security headers
7. Apply NATS hot-patch

# Validation Scripts
curl -w '%{time_total}\n' http://localhost:7126/ | awk '{print ($1 < 0.2)}'  # Response time (<200ms)
curl http://localhost:7126/api/status | jq '.status'  # API status
curl http://localhost:7126/health | jq '.healthy'  # Health check

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ito ang user-facing interface ng PC2 subsystem. Tiyaking secure ang web endpoints at may proper error handling. I-test ang response time at scalability bago i-expose sa external users. Ito ang huling layer kaya dapat stable ang lahat ng backend services.

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ FINAL: pc2_integration_testing â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
A. Cross-Group Integration and PC2 â†” MainPC Sync
B. Requirements:

# Integration Testing
1. Execute comprehensive health checks across all 7 groups
2. Test cross-group communication (memory_stack â†” async_pipeline)
3. Validate ObservabilityHub sync with MainPC
4. Test end-to-end workflow: web_interface â†’ async_pipeline â†’ memory_stack
5. Performance testing: concurrent requests across groups
6. Resource utilization monitoring (CPU <80%, GPU <95%, Memory <4GB)
7. Security validation: authentication flows and access controls

# Cross-Machine Sync Validation
1. Verify PC2 ObservabilityHub â†’ MainPC ObservabilityHub communication
2. Test Redis replication for shared state
3. Validate NATS bridge for cross-machine messaging
4. Monitor latency between PC2 and MainPC (<100ms)

# Final Deployment Scripts
docker-compose -f docker/pc2_infra_core/docker-compose.yml up -d
docker-compose -f docker/pc2_memory_stack/docker-compose.yml up -d
docker-compose -f docker/pc2_async_pipeline/docker-compose.yml up -d
docker-compose -f docker/pc2_tutoring_cpu/docker-compose.yml up -d
docker-compose -f docker/pc2_vision_dream_gpu/docker-compose.yml up -d
docker-compose -f docker/pc2_utility_suite/docker-compose.yml up -d
docker-compose -f docker/pc2_web_interface/docker-compose.yml up -d

# Success Metrics Validation
- Infrastructure Success Rate: >90% (6/7 groups operational)
- Container Deployment: 100% successful (22+ containers)
- Cross-Machine Sync: 100% connectivity
- Performance: All services within target thresholds

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
MAHALAGANG PAALALA: Ito ang final validation ng buong PC2 subsystem. Hindi pwedeng mag-proceed sa production deployment kung hindi naabot ang target success rate na >90%. I-verify din ang bidirectional sync sa MainPC para sa complete system integration.

âœ… GROUP 1 COMPLETE: PC2 Infra Core successfully deployed!
